title: Nuxt Shopping
description: A very simple e-commerce site, created in Nuxt 3 with Pinia for state management and Tailwind for CSS

imageData.name: Nuxt 3 Shopping App Photo
imageData.alt: Image of a sample e-commece site, with the cart showing in a sidebar

title: RentDee - for Landlords - in both Thai and English
description: An app created for landlords in Thailand to report bad tenants. They can also search the database when evaluating tenant applications. I used the Vue-i18n plugin to translate the site from English to Thai

imageData.name: RentDee
imageData.alt: Image of RentDee Dashboard with a modal showing a green tick

title: Crafing with Cazz
description: A blog made in Wordpress for a dear friend who is a prolific crafting blogger and card-maker. This was customised to make posting a simple process. She wanted a lot of photos in her blog posts and links back to her existing store.

imageData.name: Crafting with Cazz
imageData.alt: Image of a crafting website home page called Crafing with Cazz

title: Flask CoffeeShop
description: A coffee-ordering app, custom-designed in flask, for teachers to order a coffee with delivery from the Year 10 hospitality class. Authentication, ordering, keeping track of payments, order history, custom printed order labels, and more...

imageData.name: Year 10 Coffeeshop app
imageData.alt: Image of the dashboard for the coffee-ordering application. Includes statistics in a colourful pie chart
